'''Satisfying Salad''' is a [[food]] item that the player can cook. The [[recipe]] for Satisfying Salad is available from the start of the game.

Depending on the quality, Satisfying Salad increases the party's critical rate by '''6'''/'''9'''/'''12'''% for 300 seconds. Like most foods, this has no effect for other players in [[Co-Op Mode]].

{{Special Dish|Mona|Der Weisheit Letzter Schluss (Life)}}
